description: Object containing the details about self-employment expenses.

consolidatedExpenses.description: {{#unless (releasedInProduction 'allowNegativeExpenses')}}[Test only] {{/unless}}The sum of all expenses for the specified period. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
The sum of all expenses for the specified period. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

costOfGoods.description: Cost of goods bought for resale or goods used. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

paymentsToSubcontractors.description: {{#unless (releasedInProduction 'allowNegativeExpenses')}}[Test only] {{/unless}}Payments to construction industry subcontractors. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
Payments to construction industry subcontractors. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

wagesAndStaffCosts.description: {{#unless (releasedInProduction 'allowNegativeExpenses')}}[Test only] {{/unless}}Wages, salaries and other staff costs. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
Wages, salaries and other staff costs. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

carVanTravelExpenses.description: {{#unless (releasedInProduction 'allowNegativeExpenses')}}[Test only] {{/unless}}Car, van and travel expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
Car, van and travel expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

premisesRunningCosts.description: Rent, rates, power and insurance costs. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

maintenanceCosts.description: Repairs and renewals of property and equipment. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

adminCosts.description: {{#unless (releasedInProduction 'allowNegativeExpenses')}}[Test only] {{/unless}}Phone, fax, stationery and other office costs. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
Phone, fax, stationery and other office costs. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

businessEntertainmentCosts.description: {{#unless (releasedInProduction 'allowNegativeExpenses')}}[Test only] {{/unless}}Business entertainment costs. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
Business entertainment costs. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

advertisingCosts.description: {{#unless (releasedInProduction 'allowNegativeExpenses')}}[Test only] {{/unless}}Advertising costs. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
Advertising costs. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

interestOnBankOtherLoans.description: Interest on bank and other loans. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

financeCharges.description: Bank, credit card and other financial charges. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

irrecoverableDebts.description: Irrecoverable debts written off. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

professionalFees.description: Accountancy, legal and other professional fees. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

depreciation.description: Depreciation and loss/profit on sales of assets. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

otherExpenses.description: {{#unless (releasedInProduction 'allowNegativeExpenses')}}[Test only] {{/unless}}Other business expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
Other business expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
